Class DefaultAppContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • alfresco.DefaultAppContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppContext
    class DefaultAppContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppContext
    Default implementation of the appContext that specifies the rules to be applied.
